mods.abstract: WSM program Old McDonald's Farm Review. Originally broadcast 1952-09-19 at 7:00 pm, part 2. Personnel include Tom Hanserd (announcer), Grant Turner (host, filling in for John McDonald), Milton Estes (MC), Owen Bradley (conductor) and the Farm Review Band (performer) including Jack Gregory, Ray Price (performer), Moon Mullican (performer), and Jerry Rivers (performer).

subject.topic: National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
